QuestData.Title: Children of Tortolla
QuestData.Description: My children.$BThey lie below.$BIn silt and sand.$B$BThe others corrupt them.$BDarken them within their shells.$B$BSlay the others.$BDestroy the corruptors.$BSave them...
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 6 Deep Corruptors attacking Tortolla's Eggs in the Ashen Lake.
QuestData.CompletionText: My children.$BTell me they will be born free...
QuestData.RewardText: $R.$BYou are not like the others.$B$BBraver. Stronger.$BA part of this world...$B and not the shadow that came before.$B$BThank you.
